reference.title: Performing several tasks in one step

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Instead of typing all parameters in one line, you can use the /TASKLIST option and specify the parameters for any task in a separate file.

section.title: Parameters

plentry.pd: list_of_tasks is the name of a file containing a task description on each line, for example, parameters for several import or export requests (see examples).

If you specify the parameter in this format, you are not prompted with any message window. If you do not specify any of the /quiet paramaters, a message window pops up whenever an error occurs or when the task has successfully completed.
If you specify this parameter, you are not prompted with any message window. Any error message text is routed to stdout.

section.note: You can type the commands in uppercase, lowercase, or in mixed-case letters. You may not use any wildcard characters, such as an asterisk (*).
